articles.title: Space Station Astronauts Spot Strange Glow Over Europe - Futurism
articles.description: Astronauts aboard the International Space Station (ISS) spotted a strange blue glow over Europe early last month that turned out to be a "rare occurrence."
articles.content:
Heres what caused the "very rare occurrence."

articles.title: 'Global stilling' blamed as wind speeds drop across Europe and threaten to drive up energy prices - Daily Mail
articles.description: Weather modelling groups and academics appear to have quashed hopes of a green energy revolution, as rising global temperatures appear to stifle wind speeds across Europe's wind farms.
articles.content:
Industry experts are warning that climate change may have caused wind speeds in Europe to plummet this year in news that threatens to drive energy prices even higher.
